newsitem.title: USA: Asia Pulp & Paper at 15 in New York.
newsitem.headline: Asia Pulp & Paper at 15 in New York.

text.p: Asian Pulp & Paper closed at 15 in New York on Thursday. It recorded the day's low of 14-3/4 and the day's high of 15-1/8.
Volume was 90,700 American Depository Shares. Block volume was nil. Its previous close on Wednesday was 14-3/4.
One ADS represents four common shares.
